actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure. for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

official_title: To designate the Federal building located at 33 College Avenue in Waterville, Maine, as the "George J. Mitchell Federal Building".

summary.text: Designates the Federal building located at 33 College Avenue in Waterville, Maine, as the George J. Mitchell Federal Building.
